title.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Feb. 8, 1920. Expression of Gratitude

div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Feb. 8, 1920. EXPRESSION OF GRATITUDE

body.p: [The following letter was sent to the Bohemian ladies society called Vcelky (Bees), by Dr. Alice Masaryk, president of the Czechoslovak Red Cross, as an expression of gratitude.]
From the office of the president of the Czechoslovak Red Cross in Prague.
"Dear Sisters: We are deeply affected by your tireless and generous work, and especially are we pleased that you are sending your pleasing and costly gifts, on this long journey.
"In this, we see your love for us, and surely, everybody who receives your gifts feels it, and will never forget your help and beautiful example.

"You do not know how joyfully we welcome warm clothes and shoes for our children, for now the winter season is around and the children are freezing; still our supply is not sufficient to serve everybody. We would so gladly like to keep them comfortable.
"Hearty thanks and best regards to all of your association, and to each dear Vcelce (Bee) individually.
